overview: Freaks of Nurture is an animated short about a neurotic mother-daughter relationship inspired by the filmmakerâ€™s own unorthodox upbringing with her single-parent mom, who is also a foster parent and dog breeder. Self-deprecating and bursting with energy, the film reveals that no matter how grown-up we think we are, we never quite stop craving the love and support of a parent.
title: Freaks of Nurture
